alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 25 at 2:58AM CST until November 26 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches. * WHERE...A portion of north central Kansas. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to overspread the area during the day today and continue into this evening. Dry air may lead to a sharp gradient in snow amounts from north to south, with overall heaviest amounts from this system expected along and south of the Interstate 70 corridor. Fortunately, winds will remain light through the duration of snow at only 5 to 10 mph.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith
